title: 1 million Afghan children are at risk of starvation, UNICEF director warns
content:
1. 1 million Afghan children are at risk of starvation, UNICEF director warns  CNBC
  2. U.N. sounds alarm on humanitarian crisis in Afghanistan  CBS News
  3. A Million Afghan Children Could Die in ‘Most Perilous Hour,’ U.N. Warns  The New York Times
  4. UN to ask for written guarantee from Taliban for humanitarian issues  The Khaama Press News Agency
  5. Afghanistan: The humanitarian system risks repeating its mistakes  The New Humanitarian
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 100万人のアフガンの子どもたちが飢餓の危機にさらされていると、ユニセフ局長が警告する。
